text: Benjamin Adesanya Maja Adekunle (26 June 1936 â€“ 13 September 2014) was a Nigerian Army leader. He served as general during many important Nigerian battles. Some of which, he is known for fighting at the Congo Crisis battles and fought during the Nigerian Civil War. He began his service years in 1958. He retired in 1974. Adekunle died in Lagos, Nigeria, aged 78. ==References== * ==Other websites== * Category:1936 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Nigerian generals Category:People from Kaduna State
title: Benjamin Adekunle
